info.title: RiteKit API
info.description:
RiteKit API is based on REST principles.


## Getting started

1. Sign up for [RiteKit](https://ritekit.com)

2. Go to [API Console](https://ritekit.com/developer/dashboard/)

3. Click "Create a token" button to get your Client ID

4. Use your Client ID as a GET query parameter `client_id=YOURCLIENTID` in all your calls

5. When you reach a limit of free API Credits per month, upgrade to a paid tier.

get.description: Returns real-time stats for up to 100 hashtags. Stats are updated hourly.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Hashtag(s) without # mark (comma separated)

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=14jidgnheq5vd7m0ct7c2e3i10; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:46:03 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Returns auto-hashtagged text of the post.

parameters.name: post
parameters.description: URL encoded text up to 1000 characters into which hashtags should be added.

schema.example: Is artificial intelligence the future of customer service?

parameters.name: maxHashtags
parameters.description: Maximum number of hashtags to be added to the text.

parameters.name: hashtagPosition
parameters.description: Position of hashtags: end => at the end of the text, auto => anywhere in the text or at the end

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=hcqe46kjdueairo3s55tm04pva; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:47:08 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

example.post: Is artificial intelligence the future of customer service? #science #time

get.description: Returns list of hashtag suggestions for a single-word topic or for short block of text (up to 1000 characters).

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: URL encoded text up to 1000 characters for which hashtags should be suggested

schema.example: When you give Alaskans a universal basic income, they still keep working.

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=jg47amvonk070oflhbqgdj50hu; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:47:37 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Returns list of hashtag suggestions for an image. Takes into account both semantic relevancy as well as real-time hashtag engagement.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: URL of an image (URL encoded)

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=tspe34bcg4pmqnq8048m7lq7en; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:47:52 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Returns historical stats for a given hashtag from the last 30 days. Add hashtag without hash mark to the URL.

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=7tm8ftqjdniidnc6l526cclteb; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:48:18 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Returns list of hashtags currently trending on Twitter.

parameters.name: green
parameters.description: 1 = restrict results only to green hashtags (hot now).

parameters.name: latin
parameters.description: 1 = restrict results only to hashtags with latin characters .

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=5mq6tr41sfmrdcb41ldbujpmfi; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:48:33 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Detects and removes hashtags banned on Instagram from a list of hashtags.

parameters.name: post
parameters.description: URL encoded text up to 1000 characters from which hashtags banned on Instagram should be removed.

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=3o40mb4dacnmvunlgvmfg54vdt; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:49:37 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Returns list of emoji suggestions for a short block of text (up to 1000 characters).

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: URL encoded text up to 1000 characters for which emojis should be suggested.

schema.example: Why robots may soon steal all manufacturing jobs – but it’s not all bad news

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=qopk56lb39b9kfjba3o0r1mops; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:50:22 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Returns text of the post with emoji added

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: URL encoded text up to 1000 characters into which emojis should be added.

schema.example: Why robots may soon steal all manufacturing jobs – but it’s not all bad news

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=88q2l28pujhq644un96hvhrg8b; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:50:34 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

example.text: Why robots may soon steal all manufacturing jobs – but it’s not all bad news 🤖 🗞 ❓

get.description: Returns URL of an image created from text according to given style parameters

parameters.name: quote
parameters.description: URL encoded text of a quote

schema.example: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: URL encoded text to be placed as author attribution

parameters.name: fontSize
parameters.description: Font size of the quote (author font size is calculated automatically)

parameters.name: quoteFont
parameters.description: Font-family used for the quote (AlegreyaSC/ABeeZee/AmaticSC/Bangers/BungeeShade/ChelseaMarket/Courgette/DancingScript/Lato Black/LifeSavers/Lora/Montserrat/PassionOne/PlayfairDisplay/SourceSansPro)

parameters.name: quoteFontColor
parameters.description: Color of the quote text in HEX format (URL encoded)

parameters.name: authorFont
parameters.description: Font-family used for author (AlegreyaSC/ABeeZee/AmaticSC/Bangers/BungeeShade/ChelseaMarket/Courgette/DancingScript/Lato Black/LifeSavers/Lora/Montserrat/PassionOne/PlayfairDisplay/SourceSansPro)

parameters.name: authorFontColor
parameters.description: Color of the author attribution in HEX format (URL encoded)

parameters.name: enableHighlight
parameters.description: 1 = Enable highlight on quote text

parameters.name: highlightColor
parameters.description: Color of the text highlight in HEX format (URL encoded)

parameters.name: bgType
parameters.description: Background type (gradient/solid)

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: Background color for solid background in HEX format (URL encoded)

parameters.name: gradientType
parameters.description: Type of gradient background (linear/radial)

parameters.name: gradientColor1
parameters.description: First color for gradient background type in HEX format (URL encoded)

parameters.name: gradientColor2
parameters.description: Second color for gradient background type in HEX format (URL encoded)

parameters.name: brandLogo
parameters.description: URL of the brand logo (URL encoded)

parameters.name: animation
parameters.description: Animation type (none/rays/glint/circle)

parameters.name: showQuoteMark
parameters.description: 1 = Show quote mark icon

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=mq7cide7ehtnuieo94jkuschvh; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:50:50 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Returns URL of an animated GIF.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the original image (URL encoded)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Only "glint" is currently supported.

get.description: Returns list of available Link Ads for any given Rite.ly user. Requires each user to authenticate with RiteKit.
Returns a short link with a given Link Ad (a Rite.ly user's advertisements that are iFramed on URLs).

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL to be shortened (URL encoded)

parameters.name: cta
parameters.description: Link Ad ID returned by List of CTAs endpoint

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=pbqpb50lq1t0ko7ot07gq74vpt; expires=Wed, 08-Apr-2020 15:52:16 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly
RITEKIT=q7345tif40r55gi9l1iulm683m; expires=Tue, 02-Jun-2020 11:51:37 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Returns true for a recognized disposable email address

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=5dtb08hav9el41p14utct9ohna; expires=Thu, 02-Jul-2020 09:51:04 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Returns an array of most likely corrected email domains.

text/plain.example: RITEKIT=i696oku44tmj90vuvid8bboap9; expires=Thu, 02-Jul-2020 09:53:20 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly
RITEKIT=bsopj3meeefhaa2k2apfmfue1m; expires=Thu, 02-Jul-2020 13:23:16 GMT; Max-Age=1209600; path=/; HttpOnly

get.description: Returns a company logo based on website domain. If the logo is not in our database yet, it will be extracted from the site on the fly. White logo background is automatically removed to make the logo look better on color backgrounds. Note: It is not possible to access our company logo API publicly without authentication. If you wish to do so, you have to create a proxy on your own server that calls our API from the server side.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Hostname without http://

example.post: Is artificial intelligence the future of customer service? #science #time

example.text: Why robots may soon steal all manufacturing jobs – but it’s not all bad news 🤖 🗞 ❓
